Text:
Thanks for this torrent sceebalance.   I have downloaded it all, extracted it and it looks good.  I will watch it soon and seed in the meantime.  
   I have been looking for this doc for a while.  Harry Belafonte is an unsung hero of the civil rights movement, more known for his kitschy stuff unfortunately.   Have a look at this for good recent interview with Harry Belafonte

http://www.democracynow.org/2011/5/16/sing_your_song_harry_belafonte_on
